subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Part 3 To the Statue of the Seven
content: You can save your Elemental Burst for later~
contentOriginal: You can save your Elemental Burst for later~

subject: Drink only spring water, eat only whole grain. Proceed with elegance, avoid certain peril.
content:
"It is said that the qilin carry an auspicious grace, yet who knows of the loneliness of a benevolent being among the sea of people?" —Tianshu of the Liyue Qixing



Ganyu

Plenilune Gaze

Secretary, Yuehai Pavilion

Vision: Cryo

Constellation: Sinae Unicornis



For the Liyue Qixing of the lofty Yujing Terrace, Ganyu is not merely a companion to serve them, but is instead coordinator of the web of information that moves across Liyue Harbor, and the architect of administrative efficiency.


Complex meeting minutes, disorderly report data... Every day piles of documents flow by like water, each one personally compiled by her into clear and concise words in order to assist the Qixing's every decision and negotiation as they flow through various organizational departments.


In the eons that have gone by, the Qixing have changed with each succession of their posts, while only Ganyu has lived to see the flourishing of Liyue Harbor from beginning to the modern day.


The human blood that runs through her veins makes her reluctant to leave the splendor of the city lights, while her adeptus side leads her to yearn for the gentle serenity of her adeptal homeland.


For the half-human, half-adeptus Ganyu, between the bustling sea of people and the ethereal clustered peaks, which is more fitting to call home?

Ganyu

Plenilune Gaze

Vision: Cryo

Constellation: Sinae Unicornis



For the Liyue Qixing of the lofty Yujing Terrace, Ganyu is not merely a companion to serve them, but is instead coordinator of the web of information that moves across Liyue Harbor, and the architect of administrative efficiency.


Complex meeting minutes, disorderly report data... Every day piles of documents flow by like water, each one personally compiled by her into clear and concise words in order to assist the Qixing's every decision and negotiation as they flow through various organizational departments.


In the eons that have gone by, the Qixing have changed with each succession of their posts, while only Ganyu has lived to see the flourishing of Liyue Harbor from beginning to the modern day.


The human blood that runs through her veins makes her reluctant to leave the splendor of the city lights, while her adeptus side leads her to yearn for the gentle serenity of her adeptal homeland.


For the half-human, half-adeptus Ganyu, between the bustling sea of people and the ethereal clustered peaks, which is more fitting to call home?

subject: "This is long overdue." — "Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu
content:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~


Today, let's get to know Yuehai Pavillion's secretary — Ganyu!


The calculations and data behind the Qixing's every decision in Liyue, as well as every ordinance and regulation that is announced, are all the meticulous work of Ganyu. But beneath this model of hard work and efficiency lies a side of her that likes to eat...





​


​


​


​​

​


​


​


​​

subject: Voice Actor Announcement
content:
Why is it that people are always trying to prove that their existence has more value than that of others?


Travelers, let's listen to the voice artist of "Plenilune Gaze," Ganyu!


Voice Actor

EN VA: Jennifer Losi

JP VA: UEDA Reina


Click here to listen >>>https://genshin.mihoyo.com/en/character/liyue?char=11

subject: Character Teaser - "Ganyu: A Night in Liyue Harbor" | Genshin Impact
content:
Light-footed, she paces the streets and alleys.


She has some secrets regarding Liyue Harbor to share with you at night before the rising of the sun.

Light-footed, she paces the streets and alleys.


She has some secrets regarding Liyue Harbor to share with you at night before the rising of the sun.

subject: "Lost Riches" Event: Trade Treasure for Mini Seelie!
content:
During the event, Travelers can make their way over to Stone Gate to find Ulman, who will give you a Treasure Book along with a special gadget — a Treasure-Seeking Seelie. Go to the locations hinted at in the Treasure Book to search for Iron Coins, which can be used to exchange for rewards.

〓Event Duration〓

Event Gameplay Duration: 2021/01/08 10:00:00 – 2021/01/18 03:59:59

Event Shop Duration: 2021/01/08 10:00:00 – 2021/01/22 03:59:59

〓Eligibility〓

Reach Adventure Rank 20 or above.

And complete Prologue: Act I "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

〓Event Details〓

● In areas with hidden treasure, the Treasure-Seeking Seelie will guide you to find locations where Iron Coins are buried. These Iron Coins can be exchanged in the event shop for one of the commemorative event gadgets Mini Seelie: Dayflower, Mini Seelie: Rosé, or Mini Seelie: Curcuma!

● After completing certain treasure areas, you will unlock special treasure clues. Find the special treasure to get Primogems and other rewards!

※ The three Mini Seelie gadgets can only be exchanged for after completing all of the treasure areas. You can only exchange for one type of Mini Seelie in this event period; after exchanging for one type, the other two will become unavailable.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)
contentOriginal:
During the event, Travelers can make their way over to Stone Gate to find Ulman, who will give you a Treasure Book along with a special gadget — a Treasure-Seeking Seelie. Go to the locations hinted at in the Treasure Book to search for Iron Coins, which can be used to exchange for rewards.

〓Event Duration〓

Event Gameplay Duration: 2021/01/08 10:00:00 – 2021/01/18 03:59:59

Event Shop Duration: 2021/01/08 10:00:00 – 2021/01/22 03:59:59

And complete Prologue: Act I "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind."

● After completing certain treasure areas, you will unlock special treasure clues. Find the special treasure to get Primogems and other rewards!

※ The three Mini Seelie gadgets can only be exchanged for after completing all of the treasure areas. You can only exchange for one type of Mini Seelie in this event period; after exchanging for one type, the other two will become unavailable.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: "Lost Riches" Gameplay Details
content:
Not long ago, Ulman was the partner of a Treasure-Seeking Seelie, but for reasons unknown, the Seelie suddenly stopped responding to him.


However, this Seelie seems to be quite interested in you. Perhaps you can become its new treasure-hunting partner...


Hey Travelers~ An all-new event, "Lost Riches," will begin shortly. During the event, Travelers can make their way over to Stone Gate to find Ulman to get his Treasure Book, participate in the event, and receive the event gadget Treasure-Seeking Seelie.


〓Event Duration〓

Treasure Seeking Gameplay Duration: 2021/01/08 10:00 – 2021/01/18 03:59 (Server Time)

Event Shop Duration: 2021/01/08 10:00 – 2021/01/22 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

Complete Prologue: Act I "The Outlander Who Caught the Wind"


〓Event Guidelines〓

Talk to Ulman in the Stone Gate area to check the event treasure info. Open the event page to check the treasure maps in Ulman's Treasure Book, and then head over to the buried treasure locations indicated on the map.


​


Every day Ulman will add two more newly discovered treasure locations to the Treasure Book, up to a total of 14.


​


Travelers can equip the Treasure-Seeking Seelie from their Inventory, which will help lead them to treasure within the area indicated. Once all the treasure in one area has been collected, the map indicator will disappear.


If Travelers are not in a treasure area, or if too far from any treasure within the treasure area, then the Treasure-Seeking Seelie may be unresponsive.


​


When Travelers get close to hidden treasure, the Treasure-Seeking Seelie will begin to shine, and the intensity will increase the closer they get to the treasure. When the treasure appears, the Treasure-Seeking Seelie will shine with a special light...


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


When digging up treasure, Travelers will obtain Iron Coins. Find all the Iron Coins in an area to complete the exploration of that area.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Upon completing certain treasure areas, Travelers will unlock special treasure clues. Go to the area shown and find the special treasure to get Primogems and other rewards!


​


While searching for treasure, Travelers may encounter difficult challenges that might be easier to surmount with the help of teammates... Once Travelers complete the challenge, all team members will obtain Mora or Hero's Wit.


​


Travelers can complete co-op challenges in both their own world and others'. Throughout the entire event, you may collect a total of three co-op challenge rewards in other players' worlds. Once the event ends, you will not be able to take part in these co-op challenges.


(If Travelers don't feel like going to other worlds, they can enter Co-Op Mode in their own world, and then pin the Co-Op treasure locations on their map to easily find them later. Alternatively, Travelers can also open the event page to see the treasure locations that have already been completed, and search in the corresponding areas.)


Iron Coins found among treasure can be redeemed in the Event Shop for rewards.


​


In this event, you can get the commemorative event gadgets Mini Seelie: Dayflower, Mini Seelie: Rosé, or Mini Seelie: Curcuma.


Mini Seelie can only be exchanged for after Travelers have found the treasure in all 14 areas. During this event, Travelers may only exchange for one type, after which the remaining two will no longer be available. Travelers can equip or remove the Mini Seelie from their Inventory.


Once equipped, Travelers will have a Mini Seelie partner. The Mini Seelie you exchange for does not expire, but it cannot be used to search for more Iron Coins.


​

Mini Seelie: Dayflower


​

Mini Seelie: Rosé


​

Mini Seelie: Curcuma

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


That's all the latest details for this event! Stay tuned for more notices about new event gameplay and details!

subject: "Sinae Unicornis Chapter" Story Quest Overview
content:
After reaching the corresponding Adventure Rank and completing the prerequisite quests, Travelers can use a Story Key to unlock Ganyu's Story Quest "Sinae Unicornis Chapter."


After reaching Adventure Rank 26 and unlocking the Story Quest feature, Travelers can obtain Story Keys by completing Daily Commissions. 1 Story Key will be granted for every 8 Daily Commissions completed.

 

〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after 2021-01-12 18:00:00

 

〓Sinae Unicornis Chapter Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete the Archon Quest, Chapter I: Act III - "A New Star Approaches"

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

〓Quest Start Time〓

〓Sinae Unicornis Chapter Unlock Criteria〓

Adventure Rank 40 or above

Complete the Archon Quest, Chapter I: Act III - "A New Star Approaches"

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Event Wish - Adrift in the Harbor
content:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish "Adrift in the Harbor" to make your party stronger in combat!

〓Event Wish Duration〓

2021/01/12 18:00:00 – 2021/02/02 14:59:59

〓Event Wish Details〓

● In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu (Cryo) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

● In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Exquisite Delicacy" Xiangling (Pyro), "Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu (Hydro), and "Chivalric Blossom" Noelle (Geo) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

During the "Epitome Invocation" event wish, Travelers can stock up on weapons and characters to make your party stronger in combat!

2021/01/12 18:00:00 – 2021-02-02 14:59:59

● In this event wish, the 5-star weapons Amos' Bow (Bow) and Skyward Pride (Claymore) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

● In this event, the 4-star weapons Sacrificial Sword (Sword), The Bell (Claymore), Dragon's Bane (Polearm), Eye of Perception (Catalyst), and Favonius Warbow (Bow) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Character Demo - "Ganyu: Radiant Dreams" | Genshin Impact
content:
The fragrant licorice, the sweet flowers, the picturesque snowstorms, the falling glaze...


For the girl descended from qilin, this is all exactly what she dreamed of.

subject: Version 1.2 New Events - Round 2
content:
Greetings, Travelers! The Hypostatic Symphony event will be starting soon. Join your fellow Travelers and challenge these all-new Pure Hypostases together.


Below is an overview of upcoming events, be sure to check it out!


​
contentOriginal:
Greetings, Travelers! The Hypostatic Symphony event will be starting soon. Join your fellow Travelers and challenge these all-new Pure Hypostases together.


Below is an overview of upcoming events, be sure to check it out!


​

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Ganyu: Ambling Amidst Karst Peaks" | Genshin Impact
content: "My job is to honor my contract with Rex Lapis by looking out for the interests of all living things in Liyue."
contentOriginal: "My job is to honor my contract with Rex Lapis by looking out for the interests of all living things in Liyue."

subject: "Hypostatic Symphony" Event: Win Primogems on First Clear!
content:
During the event, Travelers can head to the event Domain and challenge the never-before-seen Pure Hypostases to accumulate points.

Once your total score reaches a certain amount, you can claim the event-exclusive namecard style "Celebration: Hypostasis" and other rewards. The first time you clear the challenge, you will also be rewarded with Primogems.


〓Event Duration〓

2021/01/16 10:00:00 – 2021/01/31 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Details〓

● Once the event starts, a new challenge will be unlocked each day until the seventh day, by which all the challenges will have been unlocked.

● Before starting the challenges, you can choose from different difficulty levels and Variations that have special battle effects. The amount of points received from clearing the challenge depends on the chosen Variation and difficulty level.

● Travelers can choose to participate in the challenge alone or in Co-Op.

● During the event, Travelers can challenge the same stage multiple times to try to set a new high score. Your total score is the sum of your high score on all challenge stages. When your total score reaches a certain amount, you can claim the corresponding rewards.


※ After the event ends, your accumulated points will be lost and you will be unable to claim any more rewards. Make sure to claim the rewards in time.


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Hypostatic Symphony - Gameplay Details
content:
Venture into a new Domain and challenge the all-new Pure Hypostases.



〓Event Duration〓

2021/01/16 10:00 – 2021/01/31 03:59 (Server time）


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Guidelines〓

Starting from day 1 of the event, a new challenge will become available each day. On day 7, all challenge stages will be unlocked. The event lasts 15 days, and we will send a reminder to all Travelers when the event starts.


Challenges can be attempted in Single Player or Co-Op Mode.


​


Before the challenge begins, you can select the difficulty level as well as special combat effects known as "Variations." The amount of points you receive for completing the challenge is based on the difficulty and Variations selected.


Rules: Variations

Variations are factors that can influence the intensity of the challenge either way. They also affect the amount of points awarded on completing the challenge. A variety of buffs and debuffs are included. Variations that increase the difficulty increase the points awarded on completion, while those that buff your characters have the opposite effect. At the start of the challenge, you can choose the Variations that suit your desired intensity.

The points total of the selected Variations must be greater than 0 to begin the challenge.

Different challenges provide bonuses to different characters. Characters in receipt of a bonus deal extra DMG. In Co-Op Mode, these event bonuses can be shared.


​



Rules: Points & Rewards

Primogems are awarded the first time you complete a given challenge at any difficulty level.

Points are awarded on completion of a challenge based on the Variations and difficulty selected. Reach point targets to claim the event-exclusive namecard style Celebration: Hypostasis and other rewards.


​


​


During the event period, you can repeat challenge stages to improve your high score. Your total score is the sum of your current highest scores across all challenges. Reach score targets to claim rewards.

(Example: A Traveler scores 600 points in Violet Lightning Concerto I and 1,200 points in Storm Butterfly Intermezzo I. The Traveler attempts Violet Lightning Concerto I again, this time scoring 500 points. The Traveler's total score is still 600 + 1,200 = 1,800.)

*After the event ends, all points will be cleared and no further rewards can be claimed. Don't forget to claim your rewards in good time!


Tomorrow we will be in touch with more details about Violet Lightning Concerto. See you tomorrow, Travelers!

​


During the event period, you can repeat challenge stages to improve your high score. Your total score is the sum of your current highest scores across all challenges. Reach score targets to claim rewards.

(Example: A Traveler scores 600 points in Violet Lightning Concerto I and 1,200 points in Storm Butterfly Intermezzo I. The Traveler attempts Violet Lightning Concerto I again, this time scoring 500 points. The Traveler's total score is still 600 + 1,200 = 1,800.)

*After the event ends, all points will be cleared and no further rewards can be claimed. Don't forget to claim your rewards in good time!


Tomorrow we will be in touch with more details about Violet Lightning Concerto. See you tomorrow, Travelers!

subject: Hypostatic Symphony - Violet Lightning Concerto
content:
The Hypostatic Symphony event has begun. To help you prepare, here is the lowdown on the Violet Lightning Concerto boss.


Unlike the standard Electro Hypostasis, this creature has a special Amethyst Prism that functions as follows:

·Activated by Electro DMG.

·When active, deals continuous AoE Electro DMG to nearby characters.

·Can be deactivated by elemental reactions.

(Note 1: A deactivated Amethyst Prism will reactivate if it receives further Electro DMG.)

(Note 2: Travelers can attempt the daily challenges in Hypostatic Symphony in either Single Player or Co-Op Mode.)


When any of the Hypostasis challenges start, all characters in the assembled Party will have full HP and a fully charged Elemental Burst.



This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


The Amethyst Prism can be deactivated by Elemental Reactions.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


When active, the Amethyst Prism deals continuous AoE Electro DMG to nearby characters.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Further challenge details will follow tomorrow. Watch this space, Travelers!

subject: Hypostatic Symphony - Storm Butterfly Intermezzo
content:
Greetings, Travelers! Today's Hypostatic Symphony challenge is "Storm Butterfly Intermezzo."

The Pure Anemo Hypostasis has the following special traits:

·New combat technique "Storm Rhopaloceros": Summons a whirlwind that envelops the entire field. Plunging Attacks that strike the butterfly-shaped core during this time will interrupt this technique.

·Its attacks will not naturally generate upcurrents, but will leave Anemo Seeds behind. When these Seeds are destroyed, they will generate an upcurrent.

·If the Pure Anemo Hypostasis absorbs a non-Anemo Elemental Orb while executing "Vacuum Burst", its attack will be interrupted and its core will be exposed for an extended period of time.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Strike the butterfly-shaped core with a Plunging Attack during Storm Rhopaloceros to interrupt the attack.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Destroy Anemo Seeds to produce Upcurrents.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


If the Pure Anemo Hypostasis absorbs a non-Anemo Elemental Orb during Vacuum Burst, its attack will be interrupted and its core will be exposed for an extended period.

Further challenge details will follow tomorrow. Watch this space, Travelers!

subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Part 5 First Meeting With Amber
content: Hey you, stop right there!
contentOriginal: Hey you, stop right there!

subject: Hypostatic Symphony - Stone Heart Sonata
content:
Today's challenge is Stone Heart Sonata. Let's see what this one is all about!


Unlike the standard Geo Hypostasis, Basalt Columns have the following unique properties:

·When on a Basalt Column, the Hypostasis Core will not change position as it attacks. After a time, the Basalt Column that the Hypostasis Core is currently on will explode, dealing AoE DMG, and will create a Sandstone Vortex that deals continuous DMG.

·After a Basalt Column is destroyed, a crystal is generated.

·After a Basalt Column is activated, it will continuously fire rock needles at characters.

·After a Basalt Column is destroyed, it will intermittently generate Geo Elemental Shards, which provide a shield for the character when picked up.

·Once all Basalt Columns are destroyed, the Hypostasis Core will no longer generate new ones, and will use a new attack known as "Gilded Tide": gathering power from Stone Beams in the area, it will continuously generate shockwaves. Destroy all these Stone Beams to interrupt Gilded Tide.

(Note 1: During the Gilded Tide phase, collect Geo Shards from destroyed Basalt Columns to protect your character.)

(Note 2: Travelers can attempt the daily challenges in Hypostatic Symphony in either Single Player or Co-Op Mode.)


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


The Basalt Column that the Hypostasis Core is on will explode, dealing AoE DMG and creating a Sandstone Vortex that deals continuous DMG.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


A crystal is generated after a Basalt Column is destroyed.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Activated Basalt Columns continuously fire rock needles at characters.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Geo Shards appear intermittently at the locations of destroyed Basalt Columns.


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Destroying all Stone Beams interrupts Gilded Tide.


That's all the latest details for the Hypostatic Symphony event! Stay tuned for details of more exciting events in the future. See you next time!

subject: Genshin Impact EP - At the Light of Dawn
content:
O watcher of the night, forget not the splendor of the dawn.


O ye who contend with evildoers, sway not from the path of righteousness.


On this long path under the faint light of dawn...


Even the herald of daybreak once lingered, lost in thought...
contentOriginal:
O watcher of the night, forget not the splendor of the dawn.


O ye who contend with evildoers, sway not from the path of righteousness.


On this long path under the faint light of dawn...


Even the herald of daybreak once lingered, lost in thought...

subject: Developers Discussion - 01/19
content:
Morning, Travelers! Once again, we're bringing you the latest and greatest from the developers' discussions! We've heard that material conversion is fresh out of the oven~


Q1: When will pre-installation come to mobile platforms? We mobile players want to play sooner when version updates drop as well!

A1: We will be releasing pre-installation on mobile devices before the Version 1.3 update. This will reduce the amount of time needed to update game resources.

You can obtain the resource package from the latest version of the game from the login menu or Other > Pre-Install Resource Package.

You will still have to use the App Store or Google Play Store to download the latest game installation package, and the pre-installed resources will take effect automatically once the previous installation has been overwritten.

We will provide more detailed instructions regarding this function soon.


Q2: I wish that we could hold down a button to add materials when enhancing our weapons.

A2: You will be able to hold down a button over the image of weapons materials to increase/decrease the amount consumed.


Q3: We'd like to use controllers on iOS devices... QAQ

A3: The developers have heard your cries — from Version 1.3 onwards, devices that have had their operating systems upgraded to iOS 14 or higher will now support the Xbox Wireless Controller (Bluetooth Version), Xbox Elite Wireless Controller Series 2, PlayStation DualShock 4 Wireless Controller, and MFi (Made for iOS) Bluetooth controllers (partial support)!


Q4: I wish that we could have the ability to convert materials.

A4: The upcoming material conversion function that will go live in Version 1.3 is already in development! Stay tuned for future official announcements regarding the required materials and rules behind this function!


Q5: Will Electro-Charged reactions triggered by Rain Sword and Oz still trigger Fischl's Talent "Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex" when neither Xingqiu nor Fischl is on the field?

A5: No, it will not. "Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex" will only occur when "your current active character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction." In other words, your active character must use their own attacks or skills to trigger that Electro-related Elemental Reaction for "Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex" to take effect. Examples of this include Barbara's Normal Attack, Tartaglia's Normal Attack when using "Foul Legacy: Raging Tide," Lisa's Normal Attack, and so on.

Additionally, we have found that if Oz is repositioned using an Elemental Skill while he is on the field, the effect of "Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex" might be lost.

The developers have already begun investigating and fixing this issue. Due to concerns that an immediate fix could trigger other unforeseen results, this issue will be fixed during the Version 1.3 update.


Q6: Why can't the Fatui Anemoboxer Vanguard counter Geo attacks any longer?

A6: The design of Anemo abilities was intended to mostly react (other than with itself) with Hydro, Pyro, Cryo, and Electro. This is in line with the design of Anemo character abilities and the Swirl reaction.

When the Anemoboxer Vanguard was first released, we did not take this principle into account and designed it with an additional counter mechanic to Geo attacks. This diverges from prior design language.

As such, we removed the Anemoboxer Vanguard's Geo counter mechanic in Version 1.2. Due to an oversight on our part, this change was not reflected in announcements on time. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused you, Travelers.


Q7: Why does Ganyu's Talent, Harmony Between Heaven and Earth, not affect the Elemental Burst that activates it?

A7: By the time Harmony Between Heaven and Earth is activated, Ganyu's Elemental Burst would already have been unleashed. As such, it will not be affected by this buff.


Q8: We would like to have more Original Resin.

A8:

1) All events in Version 1.3 that do not require challenging Ley Line Outcrops or Domains will not consume Original Resin. The vast majority of large-scale events in future versions will also not consume Original Resin.

2) Our BPs will be adjusted from Version 1.3 onward to have additional Fragile Resin rewards:

Sojourner's Battle Pass and Gnostic Hymn will obtain Fragile Resin ×1 per 10 levels, starting from Level 5, replacing the Mystic Enhancement Ores that was originally there. This will not change the total amount of Mystic Enhancement Ore gained through the BP. These Mystic Enhancement Ores will instead be distributed amongst other levels.


Well then, this brings the latest session of Developers Discussion to an end. If you have any questions that you would like answers to, please feel free to post them in the comments section. See you all next time~

This will not change the total amount of Mystic Enhancement Ore gained through the BP. These Mystic Enhancement Ores will instead be distributed amongst other levels.


Well then, this brings the latest session of Developers Discussion to an end. If you have any questions that you would like answers to, please feel free to post them in the comments section. See you all next time~

subject: "Snow-Covered Path" — Behind the Scenes of Dragonspine | Genshin Impact
content: After all this time, Dragonspine has finally revealed its true colors. Dragonspine's unique geography and climate, standing in stark contrast to the wide fields and proud rock formations of previous areas, posed an all-new challenge in terms of environment design. Travelers, let's retread this snow-covered path behind the scenes together~
contentOriginal: After all this time, Dragonspine has finally revealed its true colors. Dragonspine's unique geography and climate, standing in stark contrast to the wide fields and proud rock formations of previous areas, posed an all-new challenge in terms of environment design. Travelers, let's retread this snow-covered path behind the scenes together~

subject: "Marvelous Merchandise" Event: Open Boxes o' Marvels and Get Primogems!
content:
During the event, Travelers can look around Mondstadt for Liben the merchant. Give him the materials he requires to open Boxes o' Marvels, which contain Primogems and other rewards.

After exchanging for Boxes o' Marvels five times, a Mega Box O' Marvels will be unlocked, which provides Travelers with additional rewards that include Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.


〓Event Duration〓

2021/01/23 10:00:00 – 2021/01/30 03:59:59


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 12 or above


〓Event Details〓

● Liben will randomly provide Travelers with seven different types of Box o' Marvels rewards. Travelers can preview the contents of each Box o' Marvels before opening them. Rewards may also differ for each player according to their game progress. Travelers can enter other players' worlds to exchange for their desired Box o' Marvels rewards.

※ Travelers can submit materials to Liben only once per day. Please mind the daily refresh time of the rewards, as any unused chances to open Boxes o' Marvels will be lost.

(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

This special program will feature juicy details about new game content and developments. It will also "drop" some redemption codes and other goodies!

subject: Version 1.3 "All That Glitters" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
"On this marvelous Lantern Rite, we pray that the fallen heroes may be guided home."


Every single wish, no matter how small, is worth seeing to fruition.


We will finally reunite with those we long for on a dreamlike night.

subject: Everyone's favorite merchant is back! What marvels will he bring this time!? — The Marvelous Merchandise event will begin soon!
content:
Greetings, Travelers! Word has it that the strikingly fashionable merchant has made his way to Mondstadt once again.


That's right, you guessed it! It's Liben.


This time, he claims to have some "new deals" for his patrons. He'll be delivering different Boxes o' Marvels to each Traveler every day. If you're looking for the marvels that your heart truly desires, then you may try visiting other Travelers' worlds to see what's offered there.


After exchanging for Boxes o' Marvels five times, a Mega Box O' Marvels will be unlocked, which provides Travelers with additional rewards that include Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.

After exchanging for Boxes o' Marvels five times, a Mega Box O' Marvels will be unlocked, which provides Travelers with additional rewards that include Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.

subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Part 6 The City of... Freedom
content: Welcome to the City of Freedom!
contentOriginal: Welcome to the City of Freedom!

subject: Genshin Impact EP - Genial Breeze of Hope
content:
The soft breeze ruffles the twigs and branches, and they sway back and forth in a lush symphony of sound.


The air brims over with a bard's voice, singing slowly of bygone days and azure skies.


The wind of freedom that penetrates the forest... What sort of song is it weaving this time?
contentOriginal:
The soft breeze ruffles the twigs and branches, and they sway back and forth in a lush symphony of sound.


The air brims over with a bard's voice, singing slowly of bygone days and azure skies.


The wind of freedom that penetrates the forest... What sort of song is it weaving this time?

subject: On His Majesty's Sacred Service: The Conqueror of Demons
content:
"By honoring his oath as a yaksha, one hopes that our fellow adeptus has now finally gained some respite from the grievances that have burdened him all these millennia." — Adeptus Streetward Rambler comments ruefully during a game of chess



Xiao

Vigilant Yaksha

Bane of All Evil

Vision:Anemo

Constellation: Alatus Nemeseos



The people of Liyue Harbor greatly revere the mighty and illuminated adepti who dwell in Jueyun Karst.


During the festival seasons, they will offer up incense and pray to the adepti for their protection.


But none pray to Xiao.


For Xiao is no lucky star that promises fame and fortune — he is a demon-hunting Yaksha.


After the lantern lights of Liyue have faded, the thankless battle to protect the city goes on unseen. It is an endless battle, and there can be no victor.


Still, none of this fazes Xiao, for as the Vigilant Yaksha, he must protect Liyue to honor his contract.


This is simply the way it is.

Still, none of this fazes Xiao, for as the Vigilant Yaksha, he must protect Liyue to honor his contract.


This is simply the way it is.

subject: Story Teaser - Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti | Genshin Impact
content:
Alatus is the Golden-Winged King who is also the Conqueror of Demons. None knows whence he came, nor whither he went.


Only at springtime, during the offering of lanterns at night, might the people see the glow at Guyun and declare: "Behold, the Vigilant Yaksha ends the dominion of daemons!"


Or they might hear the sound of a flute amongst the marsh reeds, but find none who play the flute, and thus declare: "Hark, the yaksha calls to summon his old friends to their homeland."
contentOriginal:
Alatus is the Golden-Winged King who is also the Conqueror of Demons. None knows whence he came, nor whither he went.


Only at springtime, during the offering of lanterns at night, might the people see the glow at Guyun and declare: "Behold, the Vigilant Yaksha ends the dominion of daemons!"


Or they might hear the sound of a flute amongst the marsh reeds, but find none who play the flute, and thus declare: "Hark, the yaksha calls to summon his old friends to their homeland."

subject: "Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call." — "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao
content:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~

Today, we'd like to introduce "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao to you all!

His youthful appearance belies his over two thousand years of age. "Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call."
contentOriginal:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~

Today, we'd like to introduce "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao to you all!

His youthful appearance belies his over two thousand years of age. "Adeptus Xiao. I will be here when you call."

subject: Voice Actor Announcement
content:
"I'm willing to protect you. But don't think about getting close, and stay out of my way, or all that awaits you is regret."


Let's check out "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao's voice artist together, Travelers!


Voice Actor

EN VA: Laila Berzins

JP VA: MATSUOKA Yoshitsugu


Click here to listen >>>

https://genshin.mihoyo.com/en/character/liyue?char=0

subject: Version 1.3 "All That Glitters" Special Program Announcement
content:
Preview Version 1.3 "All That Glitters" now!


Lanterns light the night sky in Liyue's biggest festival of the year.


>>Go to V1.3 "All That Glitters" Preview Page<<


Get the lowdown on upcoming V1.3 content, including the mighty and illuminated adeptus "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao (Anemo), the 5-star weapon Primordial Jade Cutter, the Lantern Rite event, and more!
contentOriginal:
Preview Version 1.3 "All That Glitters" now!


Lanterns light the night sky in Liyue's biggest festival of the year.


>>Go to V1.3 "All That Glitters" Preview Page<<


Get the lowdown on upcoming V1.3 content, including the mighty and illuminated adeptus "Vigilant Yaksha" Xiao (Anemo), the 5-star weapon Primordial Jade Cutter, the Lantern Rite event, and more!

subject: Teyvat Times Issue No. 4
content:
The wait is over, Travelers!


Here is Issue No. 4 of Teyvat Times, hot off the press. Be sure to read up on all the latest happenings in Teyvat 

today!


Today's issue of Teyvat Times will be the final one. Enjoy it! Paimon hopes to have the chance to share more fun 

stories about Teyvat with everyone in the future~!


*All data in this Teyvat Report is as of today, collected from the America, Europe, Asia, and TW, HK, MO Servers.



[Prize Giveaway]

Back again for round four! Travelers, send Paimon submissions of the most beautiful, interesting, and creative pictures you've taken in Teyvat! There's no limit on the theme. Paimon will again select the 50 best pictures and reward each of these 50 ravelers with one Blessing of the Welkin Moon! The winners of the fourth photography event will also be announced in this comment section, so travelers please stay tuned.


Submission Methods:

Reply under this comment with the picture you want to submit (make sure to include your in-game UID and Nickname). Just like that, you'll have successfully submitted your picture!


Notes:

*We will collect all successful submissions of pictures on our official social media channels. Then, judging the quality of the pictures based on their creativity, we will select 50 winners and give each winner one Blessing of the Welkin Moon.

*Winners will be announced on the day the next Teyvat Report is published, and rewards will then be delivered via in-game mail within one week.

*Make sure to submit your picture according to the rules specified above, otherwise your submission will be deemed unsuccessful. Unauthorized use of others' works will result in immediate disqualification from of the event.

*The Genshin Impact Official Community Team reserves the right of final interpretation of this event.


Prize Winner Announcement

Congrats to the following Travelers! Their awesome photos have won each of them one Blessing of the Welkin Moon! Rewards will be sent out via in-game mail within one week, so make sure to claim them~


Winners of the 3th edition


Winners of the 4th edition

subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Part 7 Encounter With Stormterror
content: Run! It's Stormterror!
